caption: Remote ID Activity
description: Remote ID Activity events report the activity of Unmanned Aerial Systems (UAS), their Operators, and mission-planning and authorization metadata as reported by the UAS platforms themselves, by Counter-UAS (CUAS) systems, or other remote monitoring or sensing infrastructure. Based on the Remote ID defined in Standard Specification for Remote ID and Tracking (ASTM Designation: F3411-22a) ASTM F3411-22a
name: remote_id_activity

1.caption: Capture
1.description: Remote ID information is being captured (collected).

99.caption: Other
99.description: The event activity is not mapped. See the activity_name attribute, which contains a data source specific value.

auth_protocol.caption: Authentication Type
auth_protocol.description: The authentication type as defined by the caption of 'auth_protocol_id'. In the case of 'Other', it is defined by the event source.

auth_protocol_id.caption: Authentication Type ID
auth_protocol_id.description: The normalized identifier of the authentication type used to authorize a flight plan or mission.

5.caption: Authentication Provided by Network Remote ID

99.caption: Other
99.description: The authentication type is not mapped. See the auth_protocol attribute, which contains a data source specific value.

classification.caption: Classification Type
classification.description: UA Classification â€“ Allows a region to classify UAS in a regional specific manner. The format may differ from region to region.

comment.caption: Operation Description
comment.description: This optional, free-text field enables the operator to describe the purpose of a flight, if so desired.

protocol_name.caption: Remote ID Protocol
protocol_name.description: The networking protocol associated with the Remote ID device or beacon. E.g. BLE, LTE, 802.11.

src_endpoint.description: The source network endpoint of the UAS, CUAS platform, or other remote monitoring or sensing infrastructure.

status.caption: Operational Status
status.description: The normalized Operational status for the UAS normalized to the caption of the status_id value. In the case of 'Other', it is defined by the source.

status_id.caption: Operational Status ID
status_id.description: The normalized Operational status identifier for the UAS.

1.caption: Undeclared
1.description: The operational status is not reported.

4.caption: Emergency
4.description: The UAS is reporting an emergency status.

5.caption: Remote ID System Failure
5.description: The UAS is reporting the Remote ID beacon or device is malfunctioning or has failed.

6.caption: Reserved
6.description: An ASTM Reserved status is reported.

traffic.description: Traffic refers to the amount of data transmitted from a UAS or Counter-UAS (CUAS) system at a given point of time. Ex: bytes_in and bytes_out.
